interactables.name: Interactable River 1
dialogue: Tiny pebbles and fish lay at the bottom of the river.
You have placed large boulders that serve as a path to cross the deep river.

interactables.name: Interactable River 2
dialogue: Tiny pebbles and fish lay at the bottom of the river.
You have placed large boulders that serve as a path to cross the deep river.

interactables.name: Interactable Campfire
dialogue: The embers in the campfire glow softly.
The campfire seems to have been in use recently.
